content:
The Domo Theory
How to Actually Win With Women in Modern Dating
Introduction
Hello,
My name is Domo Vang, and I am now your dating coach. In this guidebook, you are going to find the frameworks I have tried and tested throughout my life in dating. I‚Äôve gained experience through personal stories, friend‚Äôs perspectives, and personal in-depth research.
I began giving advice about dating on TikTok, where I would simply share thoughts and stories. Over time, men (and women) have resonated with the advice, noting that they felt guidance and help in our ever changing modern world. I know there is so much information out there, so I wanted to give men the real truth about what women think, feel, and what we ACTUALLY respond best to. I want to make dating easier for men, and also better for women. I will share different tactics and methods you can use in dating in order to be more successful, and I hope you can leave feeling more confident and in charge of your dating life (because you deserve it, king).

The Domo Theory
How to Actually Win With Women in Modern Dating
By Domo Vang Dating & Relationship Coach
Contact: domovangdating@gmail.comEdition 2025/2026
Welcome
Hi. I‚Äôm Domo Vang.
I normally charge hundreds of dollars an hour to fix men‚Äôs dating lives. But I made this guide so you have my brain in your pocket 24/7 instead of waiting for a call with me.
Think of this as your playbook + dictionary + auntie who roasts you all in one.
How to Use This Guide
This is a searchable e-book, not a novel.
Any time you‚Äôre spiraling about something, just:
Hit Ctrl+F / Command+F
Type in what you‚Äôre dealing with:
‚ÄúTinder‚Äù
‚ÄúTexting‚Äù
‚ÄúCoffee date‚Äù
‚ÄúGhosting‚Äù
‚ÄúFirst kiss‚Äù
‚ÄúLove bombing,‚Äù etc.
Jump to the relevant section, get the game, apply it, done.
As I update and refine my frameworks, you‚Äôll get access to future editions of this guide. If there‚Äôs a situation you think I absolutely need to cover, email me at domovangdating@gmail.com with the subject line:
‚ÄúADD THIS TO THE GUIDE‚Äù
I‚Äôll put you on game. No fluff, no TikTok fairy dust, no ‚Äòjust be yourself‚Äô politically correct narratives.
I teach you how women actually behave, not how they say they behave online.
‚ÄúI believe in you. You are everything you think you are. I have faith in you. You are worth love and everything you desire. If you desire it, it‚Äôs already within you.‚Äù ‚Äî Domo

Introduction
Everything in here comes from:
My own dating life (unfortunately)
My clients‚Äô results
Years of observing how women really respond
A stupid amount of trial, error, and receipts
This isn‚Äôt theory. This is what works in 2025/2026.
In this guide we‚Äôll cover:
How to build a dating profile that actually gets matches
How to meet women in real life (without being weird)
How to run a first date so well she thinks about you for days
What to do on later dates, how to escalate, when to pull back
Advanced psychology & tactics that most people don‚Äôt think about or realize

PART 1: OPTIMIZE YOUR DATING PROFILE
Before you get to the fun stuff (dates, tension, making out in dark alleys), you need women to actually say yes to seeing you. That starts with your profile.
Many men‚Äôs photos are:
No signal of a high quality lifestyle
Bad lighting
Random group photos
Selfies(avoid selfies when possible)
You are not ‚Äúmid,‚Äù you‚Äôre just packaged badly (I have met many men in reality who are so much hotter than their photos!)
Photo Strategy: You‚Äôre a Premier Product, Not a Selfie
Reality:Photos matter more than prompts. She decides ‚Äúyes/no‚Äù on your face and energy before she reads your funny one-liner.
If your photos suck, nothing else matters. If you don‚Äôt have good photos, ask a female friend, a sibling, or book a cheap photoshoot. This is your sales page. (Female friends, or female family members will take better photos than an average male friend). Tell her that you want her to get your good angles. She will know what looks good to the ‚Äúfeminine eye/gaze‚Äù if you tell her to focus on that. Use that phrase.

The Core Rule
Different men have different advantages.Highlight yours.
Got a great face? ‚Üí strong, clean headshots.
Great body? ‚Üí tasteful, classy photos that include your body..
Great lifestyle? ‚Üí photos that show what being in your life feels like.
This is not the time to humble - this is how she knows why she should swipe right on you.
Photo Placement Guide (Slot-by-Slot)
Photo 1 ‚Äì The Headliner Your most universally attractive photo.
Clean, polished, confident
Think: boat pic, rooftop bar, nice dinner, good lighting, neutral or linen clothes
This is the one that needs to hit in 2 seconds
Photo 2 ‚Äì The Suit / Put-Together Look
Well-fitted suit or blazer at a wedding, event, or work function
Can swap with photo 1 if it‚Äôs stronger
Signals: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm an adult, I show up, and I get invited to nice places.‚Äù
Photo 3 ‚Äì Your Life / Activities
Show a hobby: chess, skiing, sailing, playing saxophone, cooking, something

She should be able to imagine: ‚ÄúOh, I‚Äôd do this with him.‚Äù
Photo 4 ‚Äì Full-body Shot
Clear, non-blurry, good lighting
Sport, outdoor, travel, or casual standing shot
No dirty mirror selfies, no bathroom pics - make sure background is clean for maximum effect
Photo 5 ‚Äì Social Proof
Group photo with friends, or with people in the background
You should still be visually identifiable
No obvious ex, no random girl draped on you unless it‚Äôs clearly a sibling/family (I swipe left on men who have a singular photo with a singular female if it seems romantic. Cause what are you trying to signal?)
What Your Photos Should Signal
Without saying a word, your photos should communicate:
You have resources (or at least stability)
You‚Äôre clean, presentable, and
have the emotional intelligence to pick a good photo
That‚Äôs what makes a woman think: ‚ÄúHe feels safe, but also looks like a man.‚Äù
subsection: She should be able to imagine: ‚ÄúOh, I‚Äôd do this with him.‚Äù

metadata.subsection: She should be able to imagine: ‚ÄúOh, I‚Äôd do this with him.‚Äù

content:
Quick Photo Checklist
At least one photo dressed well (suit/button-up/clean fit)
One where she can see your full-body type
One that shows high status lifestyle tbh
No low-res, grainy photos!! It makes you look cheap‚Ä¶
No photos screaming ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt cared about my appearance in 4 years‚Äù
Prompts & Text: The Tiebreaker
Prompts don‚Äôt win the first yes ‚Äî photos do.But prompts can push you over to yes, or no if you are teetering in the middle.
Your prompts = your vibe.
Tone Rules
Light
Playful
Open to connection
Minimal try-hard ‚Äúalpha‚Äù energy
Corny is OK
‚ÄúLooking for the dog mom to my Cavalier‚Äù Totally fine. Women eat that up.
Prompt Ideas
If you want something long-term:
‚ÄúTogether we could:‚Äù Cook while I do all the work and you provide the music and chaotic commentary.
‚ÄúI won‚Äôt shut up about:‚Äù How to make life 1% better every week, my last Europe trip, and my current nerdy obsession.

If you lean fun/sarcastic:
‚ÄúMy love language is:‚Äù Time apart, physical neglect, gold-digging, acts of malice, words of passive aggression.
You‚Äôre signaling wit, not actual toxicity. Women can tell.
Which App Should You Use?
Tinder  ‚Äì Max Reach
Broad audience, more casual
Keep it simple and attractive
Hinge/Bumble ‚Äì More ‚ÄúSerious‚Äù Energy
Better for relationships and real dates
You can mention:
Religion
Kids / no kids
Lifestyle
Personality traits
If you have a good voice, use Hinge voice prompts. Women underestimate how much a good voice moves us.
First Messages: Keep It Light, Move It Forward
You are not writing a novel. You are trying to start a vibe and get to the date.
The formula:
Show you actually looked at her profile
Ask something that‚Äôs genuinely fun to answer
Move towards a date within a few back-and-forths
Example (based on my profile):
He: ‚ÄúYou listed like 5 favorite first date ideas ‚Äî what‚Äôs been your favorite spot so far?‚Äù
Light, easy, low pressure.
~Six messages later:
‚ÄúWe should try [place] this week. How‚Äôs Thursday?‚Äù

Why She Stopped Replying: The Pen Pal Problem
If she was engaging and then suddenly fell off, it‚Äôs usually because you:
dragged the conversation out
didn‚Äôt lead
felt like a pen pal, not a man with a plan
When I checked my own data, the men who asked me out around 3 pairs of messages (6 texts total) had the highest success rate.
1 pair: open + reply
2nd pair: light banter
3rd pair: ask her out
Wait too long = she assumes you‚Äôre either not serious, not confident, or just there for validation.
Rules:
If she hints about going out, take the hint and ask immediately.
Don‚Äôt put ‚Äúnot looking for a pen pal‚Äù in your profile. For some reason it‚Äôs always those guys who then become pen pals üôÉ
subsection: Why She Stopped Replying: The Pen Pal Problem

metadata.subsection: Why She Stopped Replying: The Pen Pal Problem

content:
PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD
Apps aren‚Äôt the only game. You can absolutely meet women in real life ‚Äî and it can make you stand out if you‚Äôre not creepy about it.
At the Club
Best strategy? Social proof.
The easiest entry is always:
Knowing the promoter/host
Knowing the staff
Or having women friends who introduce you
If a girl is introduced to you by a hot woman, or woman she trusts, your odds go up dramatically.
Golden Rule:
Be friends with everyone.
Stop only talking to the hottest girl in the room. Be friendly with:
Her friends
The bartender
The security
The promoter
You‚Äôre building a network. Being friends with more people will introduce you to more hot women!!!
At the Gym
Gym is high-risk/high-reward. If you make it weird, you have to see her there forever.
Rule #1: Start as a normal, respectful human.
Simple opener: ‚ÄúOh hey, you can take this one.‚Äù (Let her use the machine or weights.)
section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD

metadata.section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD

content:
A few minutes later, casually: ‚ÄúHow long have you been coming here?‚Äù
No staring. No creeping. No hovering over her like a hawk.I personally can always sense when a man is staring at me. I would honestly prefer if he just comes up to me and says hello instead of making me feel like a piece of meat. Just approach like another person!
Pro Tip:Be friendly with the gym staff first. When everyone knows you and you feel ‚Äúsafe‚Äù in that space, women see you as more approachable and may want to be your friend so that she can have more friends in the gym. Gym people are a bit solitary, so some women do secretly want friends. Also, when you are friends with people at the gym, your open energy will communicate.
The One Question That Instantly Ruins It
If you‚Äôre approaching a woman out of nowhere in public, please never ask:
‚ÄúDo you live alone?‚Äù
This is an instant ‚Äúick‚Äù and safety flag.
If we just met and you‚Äôre asking whether I live alone, my brain goes straight to:
‚ÄúAre you planning a crime or what?‚Äù
Just don‚Äôt. Unless she‚Äôs all over you, clearly flirting, clearly aiming for something that night, don‚Äôt ask the question. It‚Äôs better to beat around the bush with a question like, ‚ÄúDo you have roommates?‚Äù if you want to know.
section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD
subsection: A few minutes later, casually: ‚ÄúHow long have you been coming here?‚Äù

metadata.section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD
metadata.subsection: A few minutes later, casually: ‚ÄúHow long have you been coming here?‚Äù

content:
Approaching Someone Who Ghosted You
If she ghosted you on the app and you randomly bump into her in person, it‚Äôs not an L.
Mindset:
‚ÄúOkay cool, second chance unlocked.‚Äù
A guy once saw me at a club after we‚Äôd matched but never met. He just smiled and said:
‚ÄúHey, it‚Äôs you! We matched on the app‚Äù
Warm. Simple. Not accusatory.
I hugged him, introduced him to my friends, and now he knows my whole circle. Easy.
Stop taking ego damage. Think long game - there are plenty of fish in the sea.
How to Bag the Baddie
When you‚Äôre not sure if she‚Äôs into you, lead with value.
That can be:
Social value (you know everyone, and can introduce her)
Lifestyle value (you create cool experiences)
Provide her value in something she desires. For me, I like dating stories, michelin restaurants, and being anywhere on the water. I will say yes to anything relating these things. Find out what is valuable to her - then she will agree to see you again.
section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD

metadata.section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD

content:
Get her to the date. The deeper bond can form on the date!
How Young Broke College Guys Still Win
If you‚Äôre broke and in college, this is how you beat men with salaries (lol).
You have 3 superpowers:
You‚Äôre her equal. Growing with someone is insanely romantic. She will always remember the guy she built with. Many young women are romantics, she will prefer to find her love who can grow with her.
You have time. You can walk her to class, study with her, hang out on campus, FaceTime. Time is intimacy. Time is bonding.
You have energy. You‚Äôre not drained from 9‚Äì5. You can plan last-minute adventures and handle going out multiple nights a week. College women want to farm for memories and youth with her friends. Be a part of her growth.
Play those 3 cards correctly and you can absolutely beat the 32-year-old in a Porsche.
section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD
subsection: Get her to the date. The deeper bond can form on the date!

metadata.section: PART 2: MEETING WOMEN IN THE WILD
metadata.subsection: Get her to the date. The deeper bond can form on the date!

content:
PART 3: FIRST DATE DYNAMICS
Before we talk tactics, you need the right frame.
The Big Mindset Shift to attract women
You‚Äôre simply leading with your best angles first:
Your stability (i.e job, schooling, etc)
Your initiative
Your confidence
Early dating = marketing.
You‚Äôre not making it a goal to lie by any means.
You‚Äôre just not trauma-dumping on date 1.
You‚Äôre not giving her your entire childhood file.
Deeper vulnerabilities and scars are for later (when she‚Äôs already caught feels lol).
First dates are about the experience and the impression. She should leave thinking: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs fun. He‚Äôs impressive. I feel safe with him.‚Äù
First dates are make-or-break.
*Caveat: Advanced plays are strategically vulnerable. They learn what to share on the first date to make the woman feel soft. (i.e I was so nervous when I saw you, you‚Äôre beautiful. Or, revealing deep vulnerabilities with intention.).
You can recover from a medium quality date. You almost never recover from a bad one ‚Äî especially in a city with options.
subsection: The Big Mindset Shift to attract women

metadata.subsection: The Big Mindset Shift to attract women

content:
Think of a first date as this mix:
You being a gentleman
You showing you adore her/are interested in her
A bit of physical/sexual tension (Keep it very light!!)
Also: my advice flexes depending on what kind of guy you are.
If you‚Äôre hyper, impulsive, intense ‚Üí I‚Äôm going to slow you down and add comfort.
If you‚Äôre slow, shy, passive ‚Üí I‚Äôm going to push you to to more risks.
The Three Tests She‚Äôs Running on You
You‚Äôre not losing because you ‚Äúsimp.‚Äù You‚Äôre losing because you‚Äôre simping wrong and failing her tests.
These 3 tests are running in the background on almost every first date:
Test 1: Will You Provide?
First three dates, be prepared to cover everything:
Uber there (or be prepared to pick her up)
Drinks
Dinner
Uber home (or be prepared to take her home)
I have dropped great men because they failed this test ‚Äî not because I‚Äôm greedy, but because it showed misaligned values. You have to realize that in today‚Äôs climate, women work just as hard as men, are busy, take care of themselves, and have their own lives.
What we need is polarity ‚Äî a man who makes us feel soft, led, and gentle. The least you can do is put in effort to court her. She has to play her role as well, but let‚Äôs focus on what you can control.
If you act correctly, she will have no choice but to fall into that adoring, sweet energy. Every time a man executes this behavior correctly, I become attached, loving, caring ‚Äî the list goes on. I cannot help but look at him like he‚Äôs the best and only man in the world. I‚Äôll bring him his favorite treats, remember every word he says, and want to pour into him.
But even bigger than her adoring you, the reason you should do these things is because you. are. a. man.
You are not a woman ‚Äî you are the strong, steadfast man. It is chivalrous and shows real character when you handle a woman with care, regardless of whether the date goes well or not. You do it because you have pride in who you are.
subsection: Think of a first date as this mix:

metadata.subsection: Think of a first date as this mix:

content:
Test 2: Are You a Gentleman?
Open doors
Pull out her chair
Walk on the street side
Handle logistics
When you do this, you remove a massive amount of friction, and create a safe space. She can‚Äôt be mad at you for anything because you‚Äôve handled your role.
Test 3: Can You Escalate?
You have to break the touch barrier or you‚Äôre applying to be her new platonic friend.
Date 1: subtle touches (Can be a brush of each others hands or shoulders, a hug. It doesnt matter necessarily, but you need to consciously be breaking this barrier on the first date).
Date 2: escalate from whatever you did on Date 1
Date 3: keep progressing if she‚Äôs still showing interest
If you pass all three tests, you might as well have cheat codes.
The Four Pillars of a Perfect First Date
1. Transportation
If she asks ‚ÄúCould you pick me up?‚Äù or ‚ÄúCan you send an Uber?‚Äù and you say no? For many women, that‚Äôs game over.
If you‚Äôre leading the date, you‚Äôre responsible for helping her safely get there and back.

Before: offer to pick her up or send an Uber
After: walk her home or call her ride
It‚Äôs not about money, it‚Äôs about effort and safety.
2. Always Pay for Dinner
‚ÄúThe person who leads the date pays.‚Äù
On first dates, that person is you.
If she reaches for the bill, smile and say:
‚ÄúI‚Äôve got it.‚Äù
That‚Äôs it. No lecture. No Venmo request later.
3. Initiate Subtle Touch
Touch is how you differentiate:
Date vs friend
Interest vs politeness
You‚Äôre not groping. You‚Äôre creating tiny points of contact that feel natural and safe. I‚Äôll give you my 3-step touch framework in a second.
4. End on a High Note
Do not drag the date until the energy dies.
End when:
Conversation is still flowing
Vibe feels fun
She‚Äôd be happy to keep going
Leave her thinking, ‚ÄúI wish that lasted a bit longer.‚Äù Not ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so tired, when can I go home?‚Äù
End strong, not long.
subsection: Before: offer to pick her up or send an Uber

metadata.subsection: Before: offer to pick her up or send an Uber

content:
What NOT to Do on a First Date
Biggest mistake: Trauma dumping.
Early dating = marketing, remember?
Do not unload your childhood trauma
Do not monologue about your ex for 45 minutes
Do not confess every insecurity you‚Äôve ever had
You‚Äôre allowed to keep it light and high-level.
Talk about:
Your goals
Your passions
What you‚Äôre building
Things you‚Äôre proud of
Save the deep, heavy stuff for later, when she already cares and feels safe.
Handling the Bill: The Moment of Truth
When the bill hits the table, don‚Äôt freeze. Don‚Äôt stare at it. Don‚Äôt do math in your head.
You:
Grab it
Put your card down
If she offers to split: ‚ÄúOh no, I‚Äôve got this.‚Äù
If she insists on paying, it usually means one of two things:
She‚Äôs trying to prove a feminist point
She‚Äôs emotionally checked out and doesn‚Äôt want to ‚Äúowe‚Äù you anything
The Scoff Story
Third time hanging out with a guy. When the bill came, I sweetly said:
‚ÄúDo you want to split it?‚Äù
He literally scoffed, said ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù and put his card down. No performance. No ego speech.
To this day, I still think about that man.
subsection: What NOT to Do on a First Date

metadata.subsection: What NOT to Do on a First Date

content:
Three Easy Things That Make Her Want You
These three things cost nothing and have nothing to do with looks, height, or status. They are pure emotional safety, attentiveness, and masculine leadership. Most men never do them‚Äîand women never forget them. Think of this section as mindset framing.
1. Offer Her Water (Symbolically)
I was on a date, talking a lot, and my mouth was so dry.He noticed before I even said anything and gently asked, ‚ÄúDo you want water?‚Äù Then he walked over, poured me a cup, and gave the cup to me.
Such a small thing, right?But it told me everything: he was paying attention, he cared, he was attuned.
It wasn‚Äôt servile.
It wasn‚Äôt appeasing.
It was perceptive, confident emotional care ‚Äî like a man who has lived a life, met people, and knows how to treat a woman.
2. Give Her Transportation Options
I expect men to Uber me there (or pick me up) ‚Äîit‚Äôs baseline (uber home is nice too).But do you know what he did after I asked him to pick me up?
subsection: Three Easy Things That Make Her Want You

metadata.subsection: Three Easy Things That Make Her Want You

content:
He said:
‚ÄúDo you want an Uber, a Waymo, or a Robotaxi?‚Äù
He didn‚Äôt just meet my standard; he exceeded it and provided options.That level of care, thoughtfulness, and elevation of comfort?
That. Is. A. Man.
(I picked the Robotaxi.)
3. Carry Her Things
After coworking, we took a walk.He had a backpack with his items in them.I had a backpack with my laptop and everything heavy.
He didn‚Äôt offer.He didn‚Äôt ask permission.
He simply took both and said:
‚ÄúI‚Äôve got it.‚Äù
I tried to take mine back for a second.He shut it down ‚Äî calm, firm, not annoyed.
Not because he was ‚Äúbeing nice.‚ÄùNot because he wanted praise, and not even for ego.But because in his world, that‚Äôs what a man does.
And that hit something deep in me. I literally feel so much emotion writing this, because this notion seems to be lost in today‚Äôs day and age. That one action made me feel protected, supported, and valued ‚Äî
and it made me want to defend him, respect him, and show up for him in every way I could as a human being.

Men underestimate how deeply a woman feels:
‚ÄúHe carries the weight so I don‚Äôt have to.‚Äù
What These Three Actions Signal
You‚Äôre attentive
You‚Äôre protective
You‚Äôre thoughtful
You‚Äôre masculine without being performative
You make her feel safe
Women don‚Äôt fall for egotistical ‚Äúalpha moves.‚ÄùWe fall for men who treat us like we matter.
And here‚Äôs the secret:You have to give her time to realize what you did.Let her process it.
When I walked into date #3 with this man, I already liked him‚Äîbut I didn‚Äôt fully realize how much until I had space to reflect on the kindness from date #2.
Don‚Äôt Give Her the Ick
This is a mistake almost every man makes without realizing it.
I was on a first date at a beautiful expensive restaurant (I‚Äôm talking four-digits).He was sweet, attentive, and I was genuinely engaged emotionally and physically.
Then it happened.
He started having a full-blown conversation with the waitress about her necklace‚Äîwhere she bought it, who inspired it, the meaning, everything.
And instantly, my emotional safety dropped.
I got the ick.Not because he liked a necklace.But because he shifted his attention from me to another woman on a first date.
subsection: Men underestimate how deeply a woman feels:

metadata.subsection: Men underestimate how deeply a woman feels:

content:
The vibe turned into:
‚ÄúAm I not enough?‚Äù
‚ÄúIs he trying to impress her?‚Äù
‚ÄúIs he flirtatious with every woman?‚Äù
Attraction evaporated. We went from literally cuddling on that date to my energy dropping entirely.
The Lesson
Do not compliment or engage another woman in a way that feels personal on a date.
Women are subconsciously asking:
‚ÄúAre you faithful?‚Äù
‚ÄúIs your attention on me?‚Äù
‚ÄúDo I feel safe emotionally?‚Äù
Jealousy isn‚Äôt the issue.Trust and safety are.
A first date sets her mental template for who you are.Focus on her‚Äîfully.
Domo‚Äôs 3-Step Touch Playbook
You want a framework? Here:
Step 1: Sit Next to Her
Whenever possible, sit side by side, not across.
That‚Äôs how:
Legs brush
Shoulders touch
You can lean in close when she speaks
It builds chemistry quietly.
Step 2: The One-Second Thigh Rest
Middle to end of the date ‚Äî not the start.
You‚Äôre laughing
You make a joke or point at something
Your hand rests briefly on her thigh for one second, almost as if you don‚Äôt notice

No squeeze, no grab
Then you remove it like it was the most natural thing in the world.
Step 3: The Small of Her Back
When you stand up to leave:
Walk slightly behind
Gently place your hand on the small of her back as you guide her out
This says:
‚ÄúI‚Äôve got you. You‚Äôre with me. You‚Äôre safe.‚Äù
That‚Äôs the Domo Touch Framework: side-by-side ‚Üí thigh ‚Üí small of back.
Bonus Move: The Bathroom DoorHere's something that will blow her mind. At the restaurant, if she needs to use the bathroom, and asks where it is?  Casually say, ‚ÄúOh it‚Äôs just over here.. Here, I‚Äôll just show you. Walk her there and open the bathroom door for her so she doesn't have to touch it. A man did this for me on the date and I was smitten. Pure class
Personal Story: The Scar
I have a little scar on my right knee. He noticed it, lightly brushed his fingers over it, and asked casually, "What happened here?" It was subtle‚Äîthe way he said it, the way his hand lingered just enough. He wasn't being aggressive, just gently crossing that touch barrier in a way that felt natural. I thought, okay... he is being confident. I wasn't mad about it because it felt safe and comforting.
.

The Three Dead Giveaways She Likes You
Wondering if she‚Äôs actually into you? Look for these:
1. She Studies Your Face
When you look away, is she:
Staring at you
Examining your features
Obviously using her eyeballs on you
Women don‚Äôt stare at men we‚Äôre not attracted to.
2. The Lean-In Test
Lean in a bit as she‚Äôs talking, like you‚Äôre just listening closely.
Does she let you get close?
Does she stutter, lose her train of thought, ‚Äúreboot‚Äù?
Does she not lean away?
If she wasn‚Äôt into you, she‚Äôd physically move herself back. Women are very cognizant of physical space. If she freezes but stays, and lets you come close? She likes you.
3. The Awkward Silences
If she doesn‚Äôt like you, she‚Äôs usually relaxed, yapping, filling space.
If she does like you, sometimes she:
Overthinks
Pauses
Takes a second before answering
Personal Story: The Reboot
I was on a date telling a story, and he just, for a second, got really close to my face. I had to reboot. I started stuttering. I didn‚Äôt know what he was going to do next, but I was prepared for whatever it was because I liked him. And that's how you know.
Nervous = good sign. Sometimes her being too comfortable means she‚Äôs not afraid of whether you like her or not.
subsection: The Three Dead Giveaways She Likes You

metadata.subsection: The Three Dead Giveaways She Likes You

content:
Initiating the First Kiss
The main rule: When you get the signal, don‚Äôt hesitate.
Signs She‚Äôs Ready
She lets you stand/lean very close
She‚Äôs holding eye contact or looking from your eyes to your lips
She‚Äôs lingering at the end of the date
Three Ways to Go for It
The Full Lean-In
You stand closely together
Hand on waist or her face
You pull her in and kiss her
The 80/20 (Hitch Rule)
You go 80% of the way
Pause
Let her close the last 20%
Just Ask
Say: ‚ÄúCan I kiss you?‚Äù
This works if you‚Äôre confident, not begging
Option one is most romantic, but you can do option 2 and 3 as you learn - it is okay! The absolute worst thing you can do is keep missing the moment. Once we categorize you as ‚Äúfriend,‚Äù it‚Äôs hard to undo.
When She Pulls Back Physically
If she was physical early on and then suddenly slows down, it might be because she actually started liking you.
When we don‚Äôt care about a guy, physical stuff means much less.When we do care, we start thinking:
‚ÄúCould this be real?‚Äù
‚ÄúDo I see a future?‚Äù
‚ÄúLet me slow down and really check.‚Äù

PART 4: SCHEDULING & CONFIRMING DATES
Here‚Äôs the logistics you need to know when planning the dates via the apps..
How Long to Message
General sweet spot: 3 pairs of messages  (6 messages total back and forth).
Any less is a bit short - joke with her a bit, build some familiarity so she knows you‚Äôre normal and sane
Any more can feel like a penpal or waste of time.
Also, DO NOT say in your bio that you aren‚Äôt looking for a pen pal. For some reason, those are the men who act like pen pals.
The Best Timeframe
Sweet spot: 2‚Äì4 days out.
Enough time to plan
Not enough time for her whole life to happen and forget you
Max: one week. Anything more? Just say:
‚ÄúI‚Äôm out of town next week, let‚Äôs figure something when I‚Äôm back.‚Äù
How to Confirm Without Being Needy
You DO need to confirm. Just don‚Äôt overdo it.

For 2‚Äì4 day dates: ‚ÄúHey, excited to see you tomorrow :) ‚Äù
For week-out dates:
Midweek check-in: ‚ÄúLooking forward to Saturday.‚Äù
Day before or day of: ‚ÄúSee you tonight at 7!‚Äù
That‚Äôs it. You‚Äôre leading, not begging.
What NOT to Suggest
Let‚Äôs be blunt: If your first date idea is ‚Äúcoffee?‚Äù, a woman with options will often just‚Ä¶ignore it.
Coffee can work for a second date, or if you‚Äôre both explicitly low-key. But for a first date with a woman with options? It usually signals: low effort, low confidence, low creativity.
If she ignores the coffee invite and then replies when you double text suggesting dinner or drinks at a real spot? That‚Äôs why.
Should You FaceTime Before the Date?
Most of the time: No.
FaceTime before you meet can:
Kill tension
Make both of you more nervous
Turn into awkward small talk
Exceptions:
Long-distance
You‚Äôre traveling far
You‚Äôre doing a big/long event together
If she asks to call, that‚Äôs fine. But don‚Äôt be the one pushing for it. It can signal you‚Äôre not sure you even want to see her.
subsection: For 2‚Äì4 day dates: ‚ÄúHey, excited to see you tomorrow :) ‚Äù

metadata.subsection: For 2‚Äì4 day dates: ‚ÄúHey, excited to see you tomorrow :) ‚Äù

content:
Cheap Second Date Ideas (That Still Feel Rich)
You can absolutely be thoughtful without blowing money every time.
Coffee + Park Walk (for second date, not first)
Food Truck Park + Dessert Spot
Beach Picnic ‚Äî you prepare the food, bring the blanket, handle everything
Women respond to effort and experience, not just dollars. These are good options if you‚Äôre on a budget. I would still recommend doing something on the fun side if you can! (comedy show, arcade, or just a classic dinner)
subsection: Cheap Second Date Ideas (That Still Feel Rich)

metadata.subsection: Cheap Second Date Ideas (That Still Feel Rich)

content:
PART 5: REAL FIRST DATES ANALYZED
üíñ PART 5: Real First Dates Analyzed
Let‚Äôs break down real dates I went on so you can see what worked and what didn‚Äôt.
1. The Humble Bragger
Context: Hinge, ~15 messages. He opened with something light about my Halloween costume, then asked me out.
Date Spot: Macondray in SF.
He had this quiet, humble energy that fit his bigger frame.
‚úÖ What He Did Right
Paid for drinks and dinner.
Offered to buy eye drops at Walgreens afterward (my eyes were dry).
Gave provider, thoughtful energy.
‚ùå What Could Be Better
He kept walking slightly ahead of me instead of beside me.
Mentioned seeing each other again a lot early on, which felt a little performative.
üéØ Result
I said yes to a second date. Overall, he handled it well, and I ended up having strong feelings for this man over the course of many dates.
2. The Perfect Gentleman
Context: Tinder. He made a reservation at a nice Italian restaurant.
‚ú® Good Moments (Micro-Actions)
When the hostess asked "Inside or outside?" and I hesitated, he decided: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs beautiful outside, let‚Äôs sit on the patio.‚Äù
Moved the velvet rope blocking my seat instead of letting me struggle.
Pulled the table out so I could sit comfortably.
Cut the bread when he saw me struggling.
Plated my food for me.
He didn‚Äôt spend extra money. He just acted like a man.
üí° Lesson
We love feeling taken care of. It‚Äôs the micro-actions.
3. Bar Hopping Success (Then Failure)
Context: Tinder.
His Opening: ‚ÄúAre you more of a parks and picnic girl, a caf√© and wandering girl, or a food and dessert girl? I‚Äôm planning our second date.‚Äù (I ignored him for 2 months.)
His Follow-up: ‚ÄúWhat are your favorite spots? I need to know where NOT to take you.‚Äù (That got my attention. It was such an odd but ironic, funny comment.)

The Date
White Rabbit for drinks, then two more bars.
He opened doors, pulled chairs out, paid for everything.
We stumbled into a random comedy show.
He was nerdy, sarcastic, worked at a big company but didn‚Äôt flex it until later.
The Kiss
I pulled him into an alley to show a hidden restaurant entrance. He stood close, looked down at me, pulled me in by the waist, paused, then kissed me. Perfect.
üö® Where He Lost Me
Second date day, I asked if he could pick me up (which is code for, send me an uber lol). He said he was already across town ‚Äî could we just meet there? I cancelled on the spot.
For some women, that‚Äôs a hard boundary. It‚Äôs a sign of a lack of chivalry or care. Also, baddies have sooooo many options. If you‚Äôre going to make her do any work, you need to make sure it‚Äôs at least AFTER the third date (lol). If she has many options, and you two have not established enough bonding, she will move on.
4. The Confidence Trick
Context: I wasn‚Äôt that drawn to him on the first date actually. This move happened at the end of the second date.

The Play
The Question: He asked, ‚ÄúDo you think I‚Äôm hot?‚Äù Straight-faced. No nervous laughter. Just silence to let the question sit.
The Effect: Of course I said yes ‚Äî I‚Äôm on a date with him. But then my brain had to align my answer with my feelings: ‚ÄúI said he‚Äôs hot. So I guess he is‚Ä¶?‚Äù
The Persistence: Later, when I tried to friend-zone him via text, he replied: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt agree with you.‚Äù
The Flip: He stayed confident. He kept initiating and pursuing dates with me via text. I agreed. But, in person, he was aloof, and would keep hanging out with me without chasing hard. Suddenly, I was the one chasing him.
üí° Lesson
Confidence plus calmly owning your attraction changes how we see you.
The Affirmation: Look in the mirror before your date and literally tell yourself: ‚ÄúI am sexy. I am hot. I‚Äôm the best thing she‚Äôs ever gotten.‚Äù It sounds dumb, but your body language will shift.

PART 6: ADVANCED PSYCHOLOGY & TACTICS
This whole section is probably something I shouldn‚Äôt put in writing. Use it ethically or karma will humble you.
The Domo Disclosure Trap
If you can get her to tell you a secret she‚Äôs never told anyone, she will obsess over why she trusted you.
Example: On a second date, a guy asked me:
‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs something you wanted as a kid that you never got?‚Äù
Out of nowhere, I told him a secret I‚Äôve had since I was 13: I‚Äôve always wanted a music box that plays the score from Spirited Away.
I‚Äôve never told anyone that. Suddenly I‚Äôm thinking:
‚ÄúWhy did I tell him that? Why do I feel so safe with him?‚Äù
He didn‚Äôt hypnotize me. He just:
Asked a deep, original question
Made me feel safe
Listened
Your job: create safety, ask good questions, let her open up. She‚Äôll think about you later and wonder why she trusted you.

The Insecurity Compliment
This is manipulative and ridiculously effective.
Everyone has:
What they‚Äôre always praised for
What they wish someone would notice
For me, growing up, everyone commented on my looks. So when a man looked me in the eye and said:
‚ÄúYou are so smart. The way your brain works is crazy.‚Äù
I was DONE. That hit the one place I didn‚Äôt feel fully seen.
How to use this:
Girl known for brains & career? ‚Üí Notice her softness or beauty.
Girl known for looks? ‚Üí Notice her intelligence, work ethic, or emotional depth.
Girl known for being strong? ‚Üí Notice where she‚Äôs gentle.
You‚Äôre the one person who ‚Äúgets‚Äù what the world doesn‚Äôt always see in her. That‚Äôs addicting.
The Truth About Love Bombing
I used to say, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt love bomb women, it will scare them off.‚Äù
Then I had to admit: sometimes‚Ä¶ it works.
It‚Äôs not the love bombing itself. It‚Äôs the contrast.

He over-validates
I get used to the high
Then he‚Äôs suddenly busy, less available
My brain wants to chase the feeling again.
So yes ‚Äî love bombing can work if:
You do it one time.
It feels sincere in the moment.
Then you pull back and stabilize, not keep spamming
Women: be careful with this. Men: If she likes the lovebombing initially, you can just roll this into a relationship. But if she‚Äôs sane and wary about it, she will pull back a bit. Thats when you introduce a bit of contrast.
How to Play the Player
Only use this if she‚Äôs already playing games with you and you‚Äôre okay with a toxic move.
Steps:
Have a perfect date with her. Be charming, generous, consistent.
Promise future things: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm going to take you to ___ next time.‚Äù
Schedule that next date.
Then...don‚Äôt follow up until last minute.
Text day-of: ‚ÄúOh my god, I‚Äôm so sorry, I totally spaced. We still have 15 minutes to make it if you‚Äôre down.‚Äù
If she had feelings and was playing games, this will drive her ego crazy. She thought she had you wrapped, now she‚Äôs thrown ENTIRELY off. Now she's forced to show her cards‚Äîeither tell you she likes you, or dump you. You might lose her. But if she was playing games anyway, this forces her to care.

Important:
Do not do this to a girl who‚Äôs genuinely sweet and into you.
Only for women who are already breadcrumbing and testing you.
She may potentially end things with you after this, but if she was especially rude to you, she will now start chasing if she likes you.
This happened to me previously. I was being avoidantly attached and avoiding commitment to plans. He did this, and it forced me to show him that I actually cared and liked him. We dated more seriously after this and the games stopped.
**If you‚Äôre a woman reading this, this move applies to the men as well.
The Advanced Game: Get Her OBSESSED
The Three-Step Playbook for Ultimate Attraction
This isn't for the faint of heart. This is advanced game. It's beautiful, a little manipulative, and it works. My past 'obsessions' played me with this exact formula, and now you're going to use it too (responsibly).

Step 1: üåü Market Yourself (The Product is You)
Before she can be obsessed, she has to be impressed. You need to give her something concrete to desire and obsess over. If you don't market yourself, she simply won't be interested.
She must think these three things about you:
Key Attribute
The Strategy
The Outcome
1a. Stable Energy
Be the calm in her storm. Even if your personal life is chaos, when you are with her, be grounded and calm. No drama. No frantic energy.
She sees you as her safe harbor‚Äîa man who can handle anything.
1b. Good Pedigree
Signal high value. This can mean a wealthy family, an excellent job, or a top-tier school. It doesn't matter what it is, just that you have it.
She views you as high status and a prize worth winning.
1c. Intellectual & Emotional Depth
You need to be smart, but more importantly, you need to be perceptive. You must be able to receive her emotionally and intellectually‚Äîdon't try to outsmart her. A high-value job can signal your intellect.
She feels seen and understood. This creates a deep, emotional connection that physical attraction can't match.
subsection: Step 1: üåü Market Yourself (The Product is You)

metadata.subsection: Step 1: üåü Market Yourself (The Product is You)

content:
Step 2: üíï The Sweet Gentleman (Adore Her, for Now)
This step is crucial. You have to genuinely like her and let her know it. If she doesn't believe you're into her, she won't invest. Show her, don't just tell her.
Your Mandate: Be the ultimate gentleman.
Open her doors.
Pull out her chair.
Do all the thoughtful, old-school gentlemanly things.
üîë The Magic: You need to "simp a little." By adorning her and making her feel cherished, you are setting the stage for Step 3. She feels perfect in your presence, and that feeling becomes addictive.
Step 3: üßä The Contrast (Perfect & Scarce)
Now, we introduce the contrast. After she's bought into the product (you) and felt the high of your affection (Step 2), it's time to create scarcity.
The Scarcity Play
Pull Back the Texting: After the second or third date, you will barely text her.
The Excuse (No Games, Just Life): You aren't playing games; you're simply too busy. You have pickleball on Tuesday and soccer on Thursday. Your life is full, impressive, and you are not always available.
Keep it Short & Distant: When you do text, keep it short and a little distant.
The Hook: Still initiate the next date. For example: "Hey, we should go do something next week."
subsection: Step 2: üíï The Sweet Gentleman (Adore Her, for Now)

metadata.subsection: Step 2: üíï The Sweet Gentleman (Adore Her, for Now)

content:
The Formula for Obsession
You were perfect, and now you are scarce. This combination triggers a deep, psychological need in her to chase and invest. It will make her run after you.
‚ö†Ô∏è A Word of Warning (From Your Coach)
Use this formula to create attraction, not to destroy her.
If you successfully get her and she falls in love, she will remember everything you did.
Don't cross the line. If you take the manipulation too far, she will eventually realize the game, resent you, and play you right back (and potentially harder).
The goal is to make her obsessed with you, not traumatized.
Case Study: How a Guy Got Me Obsessed ‚Äî And Then Lost Me
This is embarrassing, but it‚Äôs instructive.
I was seeing a guy who had me genuinely obsessed. Here‚Äôs exactly how he played it:
1. He gave mixed signals
He barely texted back ‚Äî short, dry replies. Almost zero reassurance.
2. But he marketed himself perfectly
He showed me the exact attributes I‚Äôm drawn to. Literally my type to a T:
looks
family
career
lifestyle
emotional tone
He was perfection with no flaws.
3. He made himself scarce

We hung out once a week.And between those hangouts?
I spiraled.
I texted my friends:
‚ÄúWhat does this MEAN?‚Äù
‚ÄúWhy did he respond like THAT?‚Äù
‚ÄúWhat does this three-word text mean?‚Äù
I hate to admit this, but it‚Äôs true:
Strategic scarcity makes women chase, wonder, imagine, and obsess.
4. But eventually, the high faded
As with most prolonged push-pull:
I got tired.
I detached.
And suddenly?
He wanted something real.He wanted me to be his girlfriend.He wanted me - fully.
By that point, I didn‚Äôt feel the same anymore.So I said no.
The Real Lesson
Use this tactic if you‚Äôre not winning with her.
But if she becomes obsessed with you?
Stop playing distance games. Lean in. Give stability. Let her attach.
Make her chase too long, and she‚Äôll simply move on.
The Result
Follow this playbook: Market, Adore, Contrast. You do those three things, and she will be obsessed.
The ‚ÄúBusy Work‚Äù Trick (10/10 Success Rate ‚Äî Use Responsibly)
This one is super manipulative. A guy used it on me once ‚Äî and it worked flawlessly. Every. Single. Time.
Here‚Äôs exactly how he pulled it off.
subsection: We hung out once a week.And between those hangouts?

metadata.subsection: We hung out once a week.And between those hangouts?

content:
Step 1 ‚Äî Make Your Work Look INSANELY Important
He made his work look:
intense
high-stakes
demanding
and most importantly‚Ä¶
RESPECTABLE
He didn‚Äôt just say he was busy. He showed me.
Took me to his office and showed me the physical products. Screenshots. Voice notes. Quick calls. ‚ÄúDeadlines.‚Äù ‚ÄúProjects.‚Äù
And because his work looked impressive and world-changing?I believed it.
Women don‚Äôt mind you being busy‚Ä¶ if its something we can respect. He told me he wouldn‚Äôt have any time to see me this upcoming week.
Step 2 ‚Äî Drop the Golden Text
Two days later, he sends:
‚ÄúHey, I finally actually have some free time. I‚Äôd love to see you today.‚Äù
Instantly, my brain went:
‚ÄúOh my god, he made time for ME.‚Äù
I canceled my plans and made it work. Of course I did ‚Äî because he framed time with him as rare - I wouldn‚Äôt be able to see him all the time.
subsection: Step 1 ‚Äî Make Your Work Look INSANELY Important

metadata.subsection: Step 1 ‚Äî Make Your Work Look INSANELY Important

content:
Step 3 ‚Äî Repeat the Scarcity
Three days later:
‚ÄúHey, I‚Äôve got some free time tonight‚Ä¶ would love to see you.‚Äù
My reaction:
‚ÄúWHAT?! He‚Äôs free again? Even though he‚Äôs soooo busy?‚Äù
And again‚Ä¶ I agreed. Every. Time.
Because when a man is:
high-value
high-status
high-drive
‚Ä¶and he makes time for you?
It feels like a privilege.
Was He Actually Busy?
Honestly?I still don‚Äôt know.
But here‚Äôs the disturbing part:
It didn‚Äôt matter, and I didn‚Äôt care.Because I respected the work, and I cared about him, it was okay (He also treated me exceptionally well when we did see each other).
Suddenly, I was rearranging my life to fit his schedule.
The Actual Psychology at Play
When a woman respects your mission:
scarcity becomes attractive
availability feels like intimacy
time with you feels rare and special
she chases the window of access
This is how you get a woman to be available at your whim.
Not by begging.Not by over-effort.But by making your time feel valuable and earned.
Women ‚Äî Now You Know the Trick.
Men ‚Äî use it ethically.Because if you use this on her, she will start to feel something.

Advanced Game: Simp + Pivot
This one is for my advanced players. If you want to operate at a different level ‚Äî this is it.
You already know Step 1 (market yourself). You already know Step 2 (gentleman energy). You already know Step 3 (scarcity).
Now we go into precision targeting.
Because here‚Äôs the rule:
You ALWAYS simp. But you simp DIFFERENTLY depending on the woman.
Most men fail not because they don‚Äôt try‚Ä¶ but because they‚Äôre using the wrong strategy on the right woman.
The Baseline: You MUST Simp (In the Right Way)
High-value women don‚Äôt respond to:
cold behavior
passive energy
low effort
‚ÄúI‚Äôm too cool‚Äù attitudes
To even get a foot in the door, you must show:
attentiveness
leadership
care
warmth
effort
That is baseline simp. But the type of simp depends entirely on the woman in front of you.
A Tale of Two Guys (Case Study)
Let me tell you about two different men I went on dates with.

They were both:
not my physical type
polite
gentlemanly
considerate
But only one of them got anywhere.
Here‚Äôs why.
Guy One ‚Äî Wrong Pivot
He:
pulled out my chair
cut my food
opened doors
paid
did everything ‚Äúright‚Äù
‚Ä¶but he negged me the entire date.
He kept lightly joking:
‚Äúyou‚Äôre so annoying‚Äù
‚Äúyou‚Äôre kinda ugly lol‚Äù
I know it was cultural. I know he didn‚Äôt mean it. But it didn‚Äôt matter.
Why?
Because he picked the wrong target.
A woman like me does NOT want banter + insult energy. For me, it kills all emotional safety.
He tried to charm me with a style that works on certain women ‚Äî just not this woman.
Guy Two ‚Äî Perfect Pivot
This man? Also not my physical type.
But listen to what he did:
Uber there
Uber back
dinner
drinks
opened every door
pulled every chair
small of my back when we walked
walked me to the bathroom
opened the bathroom door so I wouldn‚Äôt have to touch it
Who does that?? What man walks a woman to the bathroom just so she doesn‚Äôt touch the door?
A gentleman. A man with instinctive masculine care. A man who understands women.

Guess who got further?
The sweet one. By a landslide.
The Takeaway: Pivot Your Style to Your Target
Both men simped.But only one simped correctly.
Here‚Äôs the rule:
Some women respond to playful banter. Some women respond to gentle adoration. Some women respond to intellectual sparring. Some women respond to masculine leadership.
You MUST read the woman and adjust your strategy.
A girl like me?
I want to be adored. Doted on. Protected. Treasured.
Another girl?
She might want the competitive banter. She might love the negging. She might want a fiery, playful fight.
This is advanced game:
Know your target. Adjust your delivery. Simp in the language she craves.
When you pivot correctly?
You become unforgettable.
Escalating Physical Touch: The Romantic Lover
Let me tell you exactly what pushed the Guy Two into ‚Äúdangerously irresistible‚Äù territory.
On the first date?Nothing overbearing. No grabbing. No forced chemistry, but gentle undertones of care and some shoulder brushes and sitting closely.He kept it simple, respectful, warm, controlled.

But on the second date?
He escalated in a way that was gentle, intentional, and deeply romantic.
A tight hug to keep me warm while we waited for the uber.
his palm resting on the small of my back when we walked
Holding my hand as we walked on the street cause it was cold.
Slow, sweet, affectionate kisses on my forehead, temple, then cheek‚Ä¶ then lips.
Nothing sexual.Nothing aggressive.Rather, he started with romantic masculine touch ‚Äî the kind that says:
‚ÄúI like you. I‚Äôm comfortable with you. And you‚Äôre safe with me.‚Äù
It felt natural because he had already passed all three of the previous tests I discussed:
Provider energy (paid for EVERYTHING, no question)
Gentleman energy
Proper Physical escalation pacing
So by the time he touched me, it felt earned, comforting, and honestly‚Ä¶ addictive.
This is why he advanced.
This is why he bypassed physical type.
This is why other men never stood a chance ‚Äî
not even the 6‚Äô5‚Äù wealthy man I was seeing casually at the time,
not even the professional athletes (yes, the kind whose names you know).
I only wanted Guy Two.
Above any other man in my life at that moment.

PART 7: MANAGING CASUAL RELATIONSHIPS
Not everyone is in ‚Äúwife-hunt‚Äù mode. Some of you are in your player era, and that‚Äôs fine as long as you‚Äôre honest.
Late-Night App Strategy
Matched after 11 pm and the vibe is clearly flirty?
You can be direct:
‚ÄúHey, what are you up to tonight?‚Äù
But still remember:
She wants to feel safe
She wants to feel respected
She wants to know you‚Äôll honor a ‚Äúno‚Äù
If your opener is ‚ÄúWine at my place?‚Äù and you haven‚Äôt had any rapport built in the messages, be prepared for a lot of ghosting. Extremely last minute plans involving bars, late-night desserts, or wine bars are good spots to meet initially for casual encounters because they are still in public spaces, but it is easy to pivot back to someone‚Äôs place after.
Friends With Benefits (Situationships)
If you‚Äôre turning a friend into something more:
Build trust first
Create alone time outside the friend group

Don‚Äôt brag to mutuals ‚Äî that‚Äôs how you ruin everything
Many women hate the label ‚ÄúFWB‚Äù. Using the word ‚Äúsituationship‚Äù feels less clinical
Even if it‚Äôs casual, basic respect still applies:
Don‚Äôt hit on other girls in front of her
Don‚Äôt be sloppy with her feelings
Don‚Äôt treat her like she‚Äôs disposable
Are You Her Main or Her Side Piece?
Easiest test:
Do your moods actually affect her?
If you‚Äôre upset, having a rough day, or pull back and she:
Doesn‚Äôt notice
Doesn‚Äôt care
Just keeps it surface-level
You‚Äôre likely the side piece.
If you‚Äôre her main:
Your emotional state matters
How you treat her matters
She has stakes in how things go
You can move from side to main, but it depends on:
Your relevance in her life currently
How much connection is there
Whether she even wants a main
Is She Busy or Busy With Other Men?
If she regularly takes 12‚Äì24 hours to respond, she is either:
subsection: Don‚Äôt brag to mutuals ‚Äî that‚Äôs how you ruin everything

metadata.subsection: Don‚Äôt brag to mutuals ‚Äî that‚Äôs how you ruin everything

content:
Genuinely slammed
Avoidant
Or waking up in another guy‚Äôs bed
Signs she‚Äôs a player:
Replies late and then lays it on super sweet
Overcompensates with affection in text
That‚Äôs usually guilt. She knows she should be more available but isn‚Äôt.
Signs she‚Äôs just busy:
You know her work/life reality
She gives you straightforward, honest updates
She‚Äôs not overcompensating with sugar text afterward
If you‚Äôre not exclusive, you technically can‚Äôt be mad. If you want exclusivity, ask for it and see what she says.
When She Asks You for Money
There are a few categories here:
She‚Äôs written you off. You annoyed her, she doesn‚Äôt see you as long-term, and now she‚Äôs testing how much she can take before she‚Äôs done.
She values providers. For some women, financial provision is primary. They will marry the man who pays. If that‚Äôs an arrangement you like, cool ‚Äî just know the dynamic.
She actually needs help. Life happens. Only you can decide where your boundaries are.
Money doesn‚Äôt automatically mean she‚Äôs using you, but repeated requests early on are a big data point.

PART 8: YOUR DATING QUESTIONS ANSWERED
Rapid-fire answers to questions I get constantly.
‚ÄúShould I always kiss at the end of a first date?‚Äù
You should always initiate some level of physical touch so she doesn‚Äôt slot you as strictly platonic.
Does it have to be a kiss? No. It can be:
Thigh touch
Hand hold
Hug
Kiss on the cheek
Exceptions:
Very conservative cultures
Very young / inexperienced women
Strong religious norms
But default: do something. ANYTHING to create some physical tension.
‚ÄúAre bar dates okay?‚Äù
Yes ‚Äî if the bar is actually nice or interesting.
‚ÄúWanna get a drink at some random dive near my place?‚Äù Can sound lazy.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs this speakeasy I love ‚Äî they have insane cocktails, we should check it out Thursday. Are you available?‚Äù Sounds intentional.
‚ÄúWhat about splitting on date 2 or 3?‚Äù
Date 1: you pay.
Dates 2‚Äì3: ideally you still pay, but you can start planning cheaper, more creative dates if money is tight.
By date 3, you can take her to more casual dates like the park, walks, seeing the sunset, etc.
‚ÄúCan I exaggerate my height?‚Äù
Yes, within reason. Everyone inflates a little.
If she‚Äôs 5‚Äô9 and you say you‚Äôre 6‚Äô0 but you‚Äôre actually 5‚Äô8 and she shows up in heels towering over you, that‚Äôs rough.
If you‚Äôre 5‚Äô9 and you say 5‚Äô10? No one‚Äôs measuring.
‚ÄúIs double texting okay?‚Äù
Yes. The ‚Äúnever double text‚Äù rule is ego talking.
subsection: Does it have to be a kiss? No. It can be:

metadata.subsection: Does it have to be a kiss? No. It can be:

content:
People are busy. If she didn‚Äôt respond:
Wait a bit (1-5 days)
Send something light: ‚ÄúHey, would you want to go grab dinner Thursday at ____?‚Äù
If she ignores two texts in a row, let it go.
I literally had a guy double text his way back into my life and a year later, we were in a relationship. Put the ego away.
‚ÄúWhat if she‚Äôs dry texting?‚Äù
Dry texting does not matter if she still sees you in person.
Stop reading every ‚Äúk‚Äù and ‚Äúlol‚Äù like a tarot card.
Texting should really just be used to:
Set dates
Confirm plans
Occasionally tease
Then build the actual attraction in person. You should not be texting this girl all day.
‚ÄúCan I schedule two dates in one night?‚Äù
Yes, if you‚Äôre busy. But remember:
Leave 30‚Äì60 minutes between dates
After Date 1, write notes in your phone about her so you don‚Äôt mix details
Do not take both women to the same location. Reset your energy in between dates by going somewhere new with the second woman.
‚ÄúShe only likes bad boys ‚Äî what do I do?‚Äù
A lot of women confuse toxicity with excitement.
subsection: People are busy. If she didn‚Äôt respond:

metadata.subsection: People are busy. If she didn‚Äôt respond:

content:
Your job is to create:
Adrenaline
Novelty
Emotion
Through experiences, not trauma.
Plan things that are:
Fun
Stimulating
Slightly chaotic
But emotionally safe
So she realizes she can have excitement without getting emotionally wrecked.
Final Thoughts
If you‚Äôve made it this far, you‚Äôre already ahead of 99% of men. Most men never:
reflect on their dating patterns
invest in learning
ask how women actually think
Dating is a skill. Skills can be trained.
The frameworks in this guide work because human nature doesn‚Äôt change.Women ultimately want to feel three things:
adored
safe
seen
If you can give a woman all three, you become dangerous ‚Äî in the best possible way.
Remember this:
Women don‚Äôt fall for looks or perfect lines.They fall for the man who makes them feel safe, seen, and adored in a way they can‚Äôt find anywhere else.
Show up with intention.Lead with quiet confidence.Treat her like she‚Äôs precious -while still being a man with his own goals.
That balance is what makes her obsessed.Master it, and you won‚Äôt have to chase women‚Ä¶they‚Äôll feel honored that you chose them.
And if you‚Äôre wondering whether all this effort is ‚Äútoo much‚Äù?Wait until she‚Äôs looking at you like you‚Äôre the best thing that‚Äôs ever happened to her.A woman in love will desert the world for her man‚Äôs honor.
